document.full_text: the crossroads theater's new production of 'a raisin in the sun' is as strong, textured and unrelenting as it must have been when it opened on broadway in 1959.
document.title: theater review | new jersey: deferred dreams still resonate in 'raisin' revival
lines_and_colors: the crossroads theater's new production of 'a raisin in the sun' is as strong, textured and unrelenting as it must have been when it opened on broadway in 1959.
